name: require-apply-packages
description: Requires each main module from packages in a base directory, invoking each exported function with optional parameter(s).
author: Wil Moore III <wil.moore@wilmoore.com>

scripts.release-major: npm version major && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.release-minor: npm version minor && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.release-patch: npm version patch && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.test: npm run standard --silent && NODE_ENV=test mocha --harmony --reporter spec
